Name: Last Chance VR
About the game: The story is happen in the future, where human can teleport themselves into cyber world. You need to go into cyber world to save your girlfriend, Runa. You have 3 different way to attack based on different situation. Switch between different weapon mode to pass through all the obstacles! All the level design is based on the imagination of the computer and cyber world, with some knowledge of how computer and internet works.
